For me it's working. But it's possible that you find that text editor is open or something similar...

The backdoor (an alias) tries to open the file  /Applications/Monopoly Here & Now Edition.app/Contents/MacOS/Monopoly Here & Now Edition
Sometimes, the system thinks this file is a text document or similar, so it's not working. 

To fix it, ctrl clic on Monopoly Here & Now Edition.app , then "show package contents" and find the file above. Then ctrl clic on it, and "get info". In the panel opened, change "open with" to Terminal.app 

After this change, the backdoor opens the file with the Terminal, working perfectly.
